product_name: EssenceThe Super Peptide Glossy Lip Treatment
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackEssence Super Peptide Glossy Lip Treatment is designed to naturally plump and leave lips pillowy-soft. Perfect for both day and night usage, its texture provides a glossy look. Formulated with peptides, shea butter, and vitamin E, it moisturizes deeply.
details: DetailsFeaturesSilky smooth glossy lip treatmentPacked with shea butter, vitamin E, and peptidesLeaves lips plump and hydratedFormulated WithoutAnimal by-productMicroplastic particlesParabensGlutenLactoseItem 2633231How To UseUsing Essence The Super Peptide Glossy Lip Treatment swipe onto lips for plump, hydrated lips. Use alone or over your favorite Essence lipstick.IngredientsBis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polybutene, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Synthetic Wax, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bisabolol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Beta-Sitosterol, Squalene, Phenoxyethanol, Aroma (Flavor).
how_to_use: Using Essence The Super Peptide Glossy Lip Treatment swipe onto lips for plump, hydrated lips. Use alone or over your favorite Essence lipstick.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This product feels so good on the lips and leaves them looking so moisturized and has the yummiest scent! You can't beat this for the price it feels high end. I got the toffee one

reviews.headline: Forever Buy
reviews.comments: I never wore lip gloss, lip balms or lip treatments until recently. I have been using Laneige lip sleeping mask and like it but I saw the high rating and low price on the essence super peptide and bought it and wow it is super thick and still on in the morning. I will be a forever customer of this. It is a tiny bit sticky but I just love this and have even been putting it on during the day. For the price you can't go wrongðŸ¥°

reviews.headline: Makes my lips feel dry and tight
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this; it seemed lile an even more affordable version of the Cocokind lip treatment. I don't know if my skin just doesn't like peptides, because this just sits on top of my lips and does not provide any hydration benefits at all. My lips end up feeling super dry and even tight after using this. The color is nice and it looks really pretty on the lips, but this is a no for me. I threw mine out.

reviews.headline: The solution to my constant chapped lips
reviews.comments: I'd been overcomplicating my lip care routine for so long by using different balms and masks just to stave off the flaking. Using this treatment has made my lips more manageable than I've had them in years. I like to put it on under an occlusive lip mask at night (the Ulta Night Shift Mask or maybe Vaseline), and my lips look perfect in the morning. This is great to use at any time of day, as I love the slippy feeling on the lips, and it smells delicious (kinda like birthday cake or chocolate or something?). I use the clear version. I'll be buying more for sure. The price is fantastic.

reviews.headline: Soft Lips
reviews.comments: This is a great lip treatment. I use it at night and any time of the day. It keeps my lips feeling moisturized. I keep a spare in my desk drawer.

reviews.headline: Stunned at how good this is
reviews.comments:
I've been on a journey to find my perfect lip balm in a tube, and this comes really really close. 

The formula is thick enough without being sticky, it's occlusive, super moisturizing and stays on for a long time. There is the most subtle, sweet scent and absolutely no taste or aftertaste. I don't need to keep reapplying it but I'm constantly reaching for it because it is such a pleasant experience to apply. I'm almost shocked at how good this is, I like it better than a lot of my high end lip balms. The fact that it's so affordable is the cherry on top.

reviews.headline: Best Lip Treatment
reviews.comments: I have tried what feels like hundreds of lip products - lip masks, chapsticks, etc. - claiming to help with healing and dry cracked lips and this is the first product I've tried that I've actually noticed a difference in the texture of my lips. The clear flavor/scent is so pleasant and you cant beat the cost.

reviews.headline: MY FAVORITE
reviews.comments: The amount of products I have like this is in the hundred and I think I probably reach for this one the most! The fact that it's inexpensive is just a perk. I would probably pay 20 bucks for this. I have multiple summer Fridays and other high end lip balms and I always reach for this one over them!! I have all the shades and multiples extras as back ups!!

reviews.headline: hydrating!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comments: it is so hydrating for my sister's lip .she has dry lips so this helped so much

reviews.headline: Incredible results
reviews.comments: I tried this on a whim after having issues with chapped lips for weeks. My normal lip balm, which usually works, wouldn't get rid of it. After using this for a couple days, any sign of chapped lips cleared up, and my lips have stayed nicely hydrated for a couple months since. The uncolored one I used gives me a healthy, noticeable gloss and smells amazing.

reviews.headline: Amazing, needs more shades!!
reviews.comments: I didnt think I'd love this product this much, ITS SOOOO GOOD. I got the darkest shade and it smells sweet, not sure if they all smell the same or if they have their own scents but this is a very good product and is glossy too. The only I'll say about this is that I wish it lasted longer, but thats okay with me because i actually love to reapply this. I would ABSOLUTELY love if there were more shades released, Im wishing for a yellow one in a mango, or fruit flavor, but not lemon. I would recommend buying, also it doesnt taste like anything, but i wished it did. Another bonus with this is that when layering it ontop of lip liners, it doesnt leave any dry patches or clumps!

reviews.headline: The Best!!
reviews.comments: By far the best ive tried. Soothing, creamy, lasting and not sticky. Lips feel amazing. No fragrance!

reviews.headline: Great affordable option
reviews.comments: Really like the staying power and slight tint of this balm.

reviews.headline: Lanege Adjacent!
reviews.comments: Not a dupe but this tiny little gem is fantastic. Soothing creamy thick lip treatment WITH peptides its incredible! And the priceâ€¦don't think grab one or three you won't be disappointed

reviews.headline: The Glossy Lip Treatment was wonderful
reviews.comments: I purchased the pink one. I really enjoyed the feel on my lips. The price was great. Looking forward to trying more.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Beats my other lip treatments which are $20+ in helping me achieve most lips. Would love an exfoliating version!!!

reviews.headline: Please never discontinue this!!
reviews.comments: The best lip product I've ever tried, and I've tried a lot! Perfect consistency and actually heals my chapped lips.

reviews.headline: BUY IT
reviews.comments: So moisturizing and light! Sinks into the lips and is not sticky. Doesnt disappear within 5 min like some other popular lip products. Huge fan and will be buying all the colors!!

reviews.headline: BUY IT
reviews.comments: So moisturizing and light! Sinks into the lips and is not sticky. Doesnt disappear within 5 min like some other popular lip products. Huge fan and will be buying all the colors!!

reviews.headline: BUY ASAP.
reviews.comments: I am a lip balm connoisseur and I have over 35 lip balms. I reach for this one so often and it is comparable to some summer Fridays ones! I love this one so much, it is just so lovely. The packaging is nice and fits into a pocket nicely and it's just amazing!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I purchased a lip booster serum from this brand before and I liked it quite a bit despite the awful packaging that leaked even when remaining upright in my vanity, from the screw on cap with brush applicator. It seems that one is no longer made or available at Ulta.. so I tried this!! Much more sensible packaging, tho I haven't tested carrying in my purse for any possible leaks. Still I couldn't be happier and I hope they never get rid of this! I use this as a nighttime routine and it actually lasts through the night which I've never found on any lip treatment. My lips are noticeably more moisturized the next day of use. I wish I had discovered this sooner, it'll be a life saver for the harsh midwest winters! I will be purchasing multiple and plan to try it for day wear too.
faceoff_positive.headline: YES

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to love this; it seemed lile an even more affordable version of the Cocokind lip treatment. I don't know if my skin just doesn't like peptides, because this just sits on top of my lips and does not provide any hydration benefits at all. My lips end up feeling super dry and even tight after using this. The color is nice and it looks really pretty on the lips, but this is a no for me. I threw mine out.
faceoff_negative.headline: Makes my lips feel dry and tight

rollup.name: The Super Peptide Glossy Lip Treatment
